actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide for trial of unfair labor practices in the United States district court.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to confer on the district courts of the United States, the District Court of the Virgin Islands, and the United States District Court for the District of the Canal Zone, exclusive jurisdiction to prevent any person from engaging in any unfair labor practice.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide for trial of unfair labor practices in the United States district court.
